mapper.sql: id, jtid, yplb, ypgys, ypbh, ypspm, yptym, ypgg, ypbzgg, ypcd, ypzddcgml, ypsx, ypyytx, ypyytxnr, ypscdw, ypjx, ypdw, ypzcsb, yppzwh, ypysbz, ypcctj, ypjhj, yppfj, yplsj, yphyj, ypyxq, ypkcxx, ypkcsx, ypshzt, ypyhzq, ypsfdz, ypsfcyhyjf, ypcwbj1, ypcwbj2, ypcjr, ypkcsl, ct, zt, dm
mapper.select: select a.*,b.flmc from hjt_yaopin a,hjt_yaopinfenlei b where a.dm=0 and a.lbid = b.id order by ypbh asc
select from hjt_yaopin where ypbh = #{parameter jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dm = 0
mapper.update: update hjt_yaopin set yplb = #{yplb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ypgys = #{ypgys,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ypbh = #{ypbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypspm = #{ypspm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yptym = #{yptym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypgg = #{ypgg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypbzgg = #{ypbzgg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypcd = #{ypcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypzddcgml = #{ypzddcgml,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ypsx = #{ypsx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypyytx = #{ypyytx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ypyytxnr = #{ypyytxnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypscdw = #{ypscdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypjx = #{ypjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypdw = #{ypdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypzcsb = #{ypzcsb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yppzwh = #{yppzwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypysbz = #{ypysbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypcctj = #{ypcctj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypjhj = #{ypjhj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, yppfj = #{yppfj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, yplsj = #{yplsj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, yphyj = #{yphyj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ypyxq = #{ypyxq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypkcxx = #{ypkcxx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ypkcsx = #{ypkcsx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ypshzt = #{ypshzt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ypyhzq = #{ypyhzq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ypsfdz = #{ypsfdz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ypsfcyhyjf = #{ypsfcyhyjf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ypkcsl = #{ypkcsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, zt = #{zt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ypsms = #{ypsms,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ypxf = #{ypxf,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ypxw = #{ypxw,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
